person.persName: Lewis Hurst (Brooklyn, New York, attorney and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Brooklyn, New York, attorney and commissioner of deeds. New York native. Married to Mary Hurst. Father of Lewis Hurst, Mary Hurst, Josephine Hurst, Arthur Hurst, and Werner Hurst. Attorney in Brooklyn in 1860. Member of the Board of Directors of the Kings County Fire Insurance Company in 1860. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in New York in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, New York, Kings County, Brooklyn, Ward 11, District 2, p. 184.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, New York, Kings County, Brooklyn, Ward 20, p. 38; The Brooklyn Daily Eagle (Brooklyn, N.Y.), February 22, 1860, p. 4.
